prepare.title: Prepare
prepare.description: Single Source of Truth, Prompt First, Context Hygiene - Establish the foundation for effective AI collaboration.

execute.title: Execute

collaborate.title: Collaborate

iterate.title: Iterate
iterate.description: Rest & Reflection, Skill Parity, Culture of Curiosity - Continuous improvement and learning.

journey.title: Start Your Journey
